catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 481
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: three volumes bound as one with brocade cover; volume one shows famous court ladies relaxing, chatting, playing games, reading, and writing; volume two shows more common women; volume three depicts courtesans talking, smoking, primping, tuning instruments, etc.
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Ilustrated  Lives of Famous and Not-So-Famous Women (Ehon tokiwagusa), vol. 1-3
